mapper.insert: insert into inspector (inspector_id, password, inspector_name, sex, inspector_cellphone, inspector_identity, registration_date, usr_appraise, order_counts, inspector_salt, portrait_path) values (#{inspectorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inspectorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{inspectorCellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inspectorIdentity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registrationDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{usrAppraise,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderCounts,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inspectorSalt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{portraitPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update inspector set password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inspector_name = #{inspectorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, inspector_cellphone = #{inspectorCellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inspector_identity = #{inspectorIdentity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, registration_date = #{registrationDate,jdbcType=DATE}, usr_appraise = #{usrAppraise,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_counts = #{orderCounts,jdbcType=INTEGER}, inspector_salt = #{inspectorSalt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, portrait_path = #{portraitPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where inspector_id = #{inspectorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select inspector_id, password, inspector_name, sex, inspector_cellphone, inspector_identity, registration_date, usr_appraise, order_counts, inspector_salt, portrait_path from inspector where inspector_id = #{inspectorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
